cookie_consent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience.

needsboxes.hero_copy: We handpick premium tech accessories into ready-to-go boxes so you stay connected, productive, and inspired.
needsboxes.hero_badge: Needs Boxes – ready-to-use tech gifts in every delivery
needsboxes.trust_curation_desc: We design each box around real daily-use scenarios.
needsboxes.trust_warranty_desc: Seven-day exchange or return if the box is not the right fit.
needsboxes.trust_brands_desc: We partner with licensed suppliers to ensure original products.
needsboxes.trust_support_desc: Our advisors help before, during, and after every delivery.
needsboxes.offers_subtitle: Grab limited-time Needs Boxes bundles with priority shipping across Saudi Arabia.
needsboxes.category_work_desc: Desk accessories and charging gear that keep you productive.
needsboxes.category_entertainment_desc: Sound, gaming, and ambience lighting for downtime.
needsboxes.category_gifting_desc: Beautiful surprises ready to gift with premium wrapping.
needsboxes.featured_subtitle: Pick the Needs Boxes bundle that matches your budget—core accessories plus thoughtful extras included.
needsboxes.all_products_subtitle: Explore the newest curated boxes and filter by how and where you use your tech.
needsboxes.testimonials_subtitle: Real stories from people unboxing tech kits tailored to their daily routines.
needsboxes.testimonial_one: The workspace box arrived fully loaded—multi-port charger, spare headphones, and desk organizers. Saved me the hunt.
needsboxes.testimonial_two: Sent it as a gift and the packaging was stunning. Each item came with a guidecard, which made it extra special.
needsboxes.testimonial_three: Loved the travel tech mix. Support helped me tweak the add-ons for my trip within minutes.
needsboxes.faq_title: Most asked questions about Needs Boxes
needsboxes.faq_custom_title: Can I customize the box contents?
needsboxes.faq_custom_desc: Absolutely. Choose a box then reach out to add or remove accessories before it ships—we’ll tailor it to your routine.
needsboxes.faq_original_desc: Yes. We source directly from authorized distributors and include warranty details inside every box.
needsboxes.faq_delivery_title: How fast do you deliver in Saudi Arabia?
needsboxes.faq_delivery_desc: Priority delivery lands within 24–72 hours depending on your city, with live tracking in your dashboard.
needsboxes.faq_return_title: Can I exchange or return a box?
needsboxes.faq_return_desc: You have seven days to exchange or return as long as the products remain in original condition. Support handles everything.
needsboxes.contact_title: We’ll match you with the right box
needsboxes.contact_subtitle: Reach out on any channel and the Needs Boxes crew will help you curate, customize, or track your order.
needsboxes.contact_form_desc: Send us a note and a Needs Boxes specialist will respond during business hours.
needsboxes.contact_phone_placeholder: Update the support number from the dashboard
needsboxes.contact_whatsapp_desc: Available daily from 10 a.m. to 10 p.m.
